body_html:
@yongtang IMHO, you can give a clearer explanation than the one you added in the commit of the PR.

What do you mean by "it is counted backward from the end"? "it" may be ambiguous. Are you referring to what? Give one or two examples (like the one in my explanation above), that's what usually clarifies all doubts!!
